Class GeocodingClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • <any>
      • com.here.mobility.sdk.map.geocoding.GeocodingClient

  • public final class GeocodingClient
extends <any>
    The client class for accessing the Geocoding API.

      • getAddressDetails

        public ResponseFuture<Address> getAddressDetails(GeocodingResult geocodingResult,
                                                 String languageCode)
        Sends a request for the address data of the given GeocodingResult, in the given preferred language.
        Parameters:
        geocodingResult - The geocoding result whose address details to return
        languageCode - ISO 639-1 language code for the preferred language of the address
